scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed churn prediction model via a model inversion attack.  The attacker leverages carefully crafted queries to infer private information, circumventing data privacy safeguards.
initial_goal: Determine the likelihood of customer churn for a given set of anonymized customer features.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: Customer churn prediction model deployed for proactive retention strategies. The model uses sensitive data like income, credit score, and transaction history, which are partially anonymized but not fully protected against sophisticated attacks.
